trends: There have been no other sightings in Nash
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: triangle shape ufo over country land
divs: Sighting Detailsso i was driving late at night on my way from tulsa to colorado city i was going to pass the night in cherokee, but then like in between ponca city and the crossing to go to jefferson was where i first saw the ufo and then in the distance i could see a triangular aircraft i was alone on the highway and it then came close and did like a L turn and flew at around 1000 feet high and flew parallel to the highway then it zoomed away.
